# tradisanalyseR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

tradisanalyseR was developed as a collection of scripts to further analyse output produced by the Bio-TraDIS toolkit (https://github.com/sanger-pathogens/Bio-Tradis). It takes the resulting csv files for any number of conditions and the corresponding EMBL file and formats it for use in these scripts.

## Installation

<!-- You can install the released version of tradisanalyseR from  [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tradisanalyseR")
```
-->
The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gerisullivan/tradisanalyseR")
```

tradisanalyseR has the following dependencies:
```r
dplyr
ggplot2
purrr
stats
stringr
```
